Name: Statuette of Osiris
Description: Osiris is represented standing on a flat base; his body is enveloped in a tightly fitting mummy gown leaving exposed only his hands holding a crook and a flail; he wears an atef-crown with ram's horns and uraeus, a broad collar and a pleated artificial beard. There is an eye for suspending at the back of the statuette, at the level of the neck; the other eye is at the proper right side of the base.
